articles.author: Tim MacMahon
articles.title: Sources - Utah Jazz trading star center Rudy Gobert to Minnesota Timberwolves for four first-round picks - ESPN India
articles.description: Minnesota is sending its 2023, 2025 and 2027 picks unprotected and a top-5-protected 2029 pick to Utah in exchange for Rudy Gobert, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: The Utah Jazz agreed to trade center Rudy Gobert to the Minnesota Timberwolves in a blockbuster deal that will pair him with fellow All-Star big man Karl-Anthony Towns, sources told ESPN's Adrian Woj… [+3802 chars]
